ActJudges Act
SubjectNorma Perras ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. P. William Perras **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to NORMA PERRAS, widow of the Hon. P. William Perras, Judge of the Ontario Court of Justice (General Division), effective December 12, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
